structure.unit: Money And Registration, Issuance And Redemption Of Bonds And Other Securities, Facsimile Signatures

law.catch_line: Accounts, Notes, Bonds Or Other Instruments Expressed In Other Moneys
law.text: The preceding section shall not vitiate or affect an account, charge or entry made, or a note, bond or other instrument expressed in any other money of account; but in a suit thereon such other money shall be reduced to dollars and fractions thereof.
